title: Prices Lowered 10/20 -  T206 Sale lot - Last of em! Go CUBS GO!  Cub Heavy!
author: Golfcollector

posts.post_title: Prices Lowered 10/20 -  T206 Sale lot - Last of em! Go CUBS GO!  Cub Heavy!
posts.post_content:
Here is the last of the T206 cards I will be selling.  Please add $5 shipping to all orders for priority mail.

Enlarged scans provided on all cards to best show condition of the cards for sale.

Please PM to reserve. 

Piedmont 350 - Frank Chance Portrait - yellow background PSA - Altered. - $70 - I think the scan will show it appears the borders were maybe "cleaned" not sure but overall a very attractive card.

[IMG]http://i626.photobucket.com/albums/tt347/Golfcollector/img881_zpsy5aqlwd2.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i626.photobucket.com/albums/tt347/Golfcollector/img882_zpsmpwuetwj.jpg[/IMG]

Piedmont 350 Del Howard - PSA - Altered - Not sure on this one either.  Looks pretty darn nice to me!  Priced fairly at $20

[IMG]http://i626.photobucket.com/albums/tt347/Golfcollector/img676_zpsunyf7qh8.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i626.photobucket.com/albums/tt347/Golfcollector/img684_zps6wankwt2.jpg[/IMG]


Sweet Caporal 350/25  Pat Moran - PSA 3 $SOLD Per PSA population report this is the only Sweet Caporal factory 25 currently graded with that designation on a holder.

[IMG]http://i626.photobucket.com/albums/tt347/Golfcollector/PSAbaseballcards/img785_zpsn2kfsq1g.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i626.photobucket.com/albums/tt347/Golfcollector/PSAbaseballcards/img789_zps4ktqc6jh.jpg[/IMG]

 Sweet Caporal 350/25 Jake Pfeister Cubs PSA 2 -  $SOLD Population of just 3 graded.  Tough card currently.   

[IMG]http://i626.photobucket.com/albums/tt347/Golfcollector/img880_zpsn4qz03vy.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i626.photobucket.com/albums/tt347/Golfcollector/img883_zpstzfil5tz.jpg[/IMG]

Piedmont 350-460 / 25 Wildfire Schulte PSA Evidence of Trim. Dynamite appeal, likely skinned some years ago. Great Eye appeal  $20

[IMG]http://i626.photobucket.com/albums/tt347/Golfcollector/img677_zpsewwnvp02.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i626.photobucket.com/albums/tt347/Golfcollector/img683_zpsn9cwpou3.jpg[/IMG]
Can't believe some of these are still here at these prices....come and get em!
The top corners of the two scans of the Howard don't appear to match to me... are you sure the back scan is correct?
